```{css, echo=FALSE}
.author,.title{
    display: none;
}

.autor {
   margin-right: 4px;
   padding: 0 4px;
   border: 1px solid hsl(0, 0%, 75%);
   border-radius: 2px;
}

.projeto {
  display: flex
}

.nome{
  font-weight: bold
}

.info{
  margin-left: 12px;
}

.thumb{
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

```
